sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { Table,Checkbox,Button} from 'semantic-ui-react'; import '../App.css' export default function ShowRequest(props) { const[reqNo,setReq]=useState(null) const[cAddress,setCaddress]=useState(null) const[description,setDes]=useState(null) const[amount,setAmount]=useState(null) const[recipient,setRecp]=useState(null) const[donors,setDonors]=useState(null) const[voters,setVoters]=useState(null) const[completed,setCom]=useState(null) const requestArray={ reqNo,cAddress,description,amount,recipient,donors,voters,completed } const requestInfo=async()=>{ const info = await props.contract.methods.getRequeststatus().call(); setReq(info[5]) setCaddress(info[3]) setDes(info[2]) setAmount(props.web3.utils.fromWei(info[6])) setCom(info[7]) setVoters(info[0]) setDonors(info[1]) setRecp(info[4]) } const[Requests,setRequests]=useState([]) setRequests([...Requests,requestInfo]) return (

Request Info:

Request_NO Creator Description: Amount: Recipient: Voters/Donors {Requests.map((request,index) => ( {reqNo} {cAddress} {description} {amount} {recipient} {voters}/{donors} ) )}
) }
